snippet.title: Sparkball - Season Zero - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
After months of quietly building, we are beyond excited to announce the upcoming launch of Season Zero - the starting place for your storied journey to Sparkball stardom. 

Over the next couple months, we'll be hosting frequent events and releasing mountains of content alongside our partners where you'll get to dive headfirst into the world of Sparkball. Your journey will culminate in August as we launch a massive 10-day Early Access event where you'll learn to balance ballin' and brawlin'' - climbing the ladder, participating in tournaments, earning exclusive rewards, and a LOT more.

- About Sparkball -
Sparkball is a 4v4 adrenaline-packed ‘sports brawler’ where players select from a cast of lovably unique heroes and carefully balance both ballin' and brawlin' to score in the enemy team's goal! Affectionately described as League of Legends meets Rocket League (or Kung Fu-tbol!), Sparkball grips you immediately with its dopamine-inducing take on combat sports and keeps you coming back for more as you strive to master its surprisingly complex strategies.

- Official Links -
Website - http://sparkball.gg/
Discord -  http://discord.gg/playSparkball
X/Twitter - http://x.com/playSparkball
Youtube - http://youtube.com/playSparkball
Opti Games - http://beopti.gg/

Trailer edited by Brane Studio
